Title: Shark Tank SGGS
Description: Shark Tank SGGS is a dynamic event where students pitch innovative business ideas, products, or startups to a panel of judges, competing for exciting prizes based on their creativity, feasibility, and presentation skills.

Title: CAD AND CATIA
Description: CAD (Computer-Aided Design) is software used to create detailed 2D and 3D models for design and engineering purposes, improving accuracy and efficiency across various industries. CATIA is a powerful CAD software developed by Dassault Syst√®mes, known for its advanced 3D modeling, product design, and engineering capabilities, particularly in aerospace, automotive, and industrial sectors.
